name: The inner Fire - GGJ2022
description:
You always wanted to operate a train? You always wanted to operate a train!

Utilize the air controls to keep the heat under control. Find the sweet spot that gets your train going for the longest time.

Balance is all!

This game was created as part of the Global Game Jam 2022: https://globalgamejam.org/2022/games/inner-fire-2

Train controls

Use Cursor up/down to switch between different camera positions

Drag right/left on the air control knob to regulate the air intake on the engine.

Drag down/up on the brake to control the train speed.
